statements: UPDATE social_media_sentiment SET sentiment_score = 4.5 WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE social_media_sentiment SET sentiment_text = 'Positive' WHERE politician_id = 'abcdef12-3456-7890-1234-567890abcdef';
UPDATE social_media_sentiment SET sentiment_score = 8.5, sentiment_text = 'Positive' WHERE post_id = '2bf930aa-8d72-4d55-83a9-44cd5d7c9445';
UPDATE social_media_sentiment SET sentiment_text = 'Negative', sentiment_score = 4.2 WHERE politician_id = 'f77a4965-1be9-4c4b-b2fb-12f2797c8b67';
UPDATE politicians SET followers_count = 1000 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE tweets SET sentiment = 'positive', author_id = 5 WHERE tweet_id = 10;
UPDATE politicians SET followers_count = followers_count + 100, sentiment_score = 0.75 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE tweets SET sentiment = 'Positive', posted_at = NOW() WHERE tweet_id = 10;
UPDATE politicians SET number_of_followers = 500 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE posts SET content = 'New Content', post_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE post_id = 10;

UPDATE posts SET content='New content', post_date='2022-09-15' WHERE politician_id=1;

UPDATE posts SET post_text = 'Updated post text' WHERE post_id = 123;
UPDATE politicians SET party = 'Democrat' WHERE politician_id = 1;
UPDATE reactions SET reaction_type = 'like' WHERE user_id = 100 AND post_id = 5;

UPDATE tweets SET content = 'New tweet content', created_at = '2022-01-01 09:00:00' WHERE tweet_id = 123;
